mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE, AUTHORITY, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "MEMBER" VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberName}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddress}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
